entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -32.9°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -37.1°C
Wind: WSW 24 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
